subject: Baseball
Surgery and Surgeons
Muscles
lead_paragraph: Jorge Posada left the Yankees on Monday to visit a orthopedic surgeon in Birmingham, Ala., and it could be a long time before he rejoins the active roster.
snippet: Jorge Posada left the Yankees on Monday to visit a orthopedic surgeon in Birmingham, Ala., and it could be a long time before he rejoins the active roster.
